title: Ward Village Shops
seo_description: Check out discount stores like Nordstrom Rack and TJ Maxx for brand-name designers without the brand-name prices.
contents_1: Check out discount stores like Nordstrom Rack and TJ Maxx for brand-name designers without the brand-name prices.
description: Check out discount stores like Nordstrom Rack and TJ Maxx for brand-name designers without the brand-name prices. Ward Center also houses Marukai Market Place with a large selection of groceries, Japanese products, gifts, and prepared food.
